function.name: send_voice_note
function.description: Generates a voice note from the provided text message using a text-to-speech service and sends it directly to the chat. **Important: Calling this tool sends the voice message to the user immediately.** Do *not* include the message text in your own response after calling this tool. Use this if the user explicitly asks for a voice response or if a voice note feels more appropriate for the message content.

message.description: The text message to be converted into a voice note. This exact text will be sent to the user as a voice message via this tool. **Do NOT repeat this message text in your response after using this tool.**
